articles.title: Four victims of Bayesian sinking suffocated in air pocket - reports
articles.description: Investigators believe their cabin filled with carbon dioxide as the oxygen supply diminished.
articles.content: Four people who died when the Bayesian superyacht sank off the coast of Sicily last month suffocated after oxygen depleted in a pocket of air they were trapped in, the Italian news agency Ansa has re… [+489 chars]

articles.title: Michel Barnier named by Macron as new French PM
